---

title: 一段 Python 的精确除法脚本
description: "一段 Python 的精确除法脚本"
category: articles
tags: [python, 除法]
image:
  feature:
  credit: Michael Rose
  creditlink: http://mademistakes.com
comments: true
share: true
---

~~~
#!/usr/bin/python

def divmod_plus(a, b, n):
    point = False
    for i in xrange(n):
        a, c = divmod(a, b)
        if c >= b:
            yield str(a)
        else:
            yield '%d' % a
            if point is False:
                point = True
                yield '.'
        a = c * 10

print ''.join(divmod_plus(100, 37, 1000))
~~~

输出结果为：

~~~
2.
~~~
